title: Question about switching from PESSAT to KCET seat
content: I am currently in first semester in EC campus thru PESSAT and got seat alloted for the same campus and same branch in KCET. anyone knows the procedure to switch from PESSAT quota to KCET quota?

comments.body: Hello. I got my PESSAT seat switched to KCET seat in 2020. You just have to go to the admissions block with your CET allotment letter, they'll do the needful immediately. You might have to write a letter explaining the scenario to get your refund

Thanks for your reply! I have two questions-

1) Do I need to go to RR Campus Admin Block?

2) Do I need to go myself or could I have my parent go on my behalf?

1. Yes 
2. Go along with your parents, they'll ask you and your parent to sign on the acknowledgment sheet again
just curious, is pessat seat to kcet seat in another college (not pesu basically) even possible?
